appDescription.message: Stay safe while browsing the web with WOT, the best multi-platform security service with real-time alerts.

trustIssues.message: This site has some trust issues. Tread carefully.

isSafe.message: Do you think this site is safe?

thankYouForInstalling.message: Next, make sure you are fully protected by choosing your protection shield

youCanAlwaysChange.message: (you can always change your preferences later)

liteText.message: We won’t bother you - only when it’s critical

defaultText.message: Block and avoid websites with a low reputation. (Recommended)

highText.message: Block any suspicious websites. Websites with inappropriate content for children will be blocked by default

WARNINGS_LEVEL_HIGH.message: Shows warnings for all website that have poor rating

WARNINGS_LEVEL_NORMAL.message: Shows warnings on malicious websites only

SHIELDS_LEVEL_OFF.message: No reputation icons will be shown

hideWotAssistantText.message: Once you click ‘Hide’ you will no longer see the WOT assistant page loading. You can always change this in your settings later.

wotAssistantON.message: Show website reputation in the corner of my browser

wotAssistantOFF.message: Don't show good website reputation in the corner of my browser

parentalControlOFF.message: Websites with inappropriate content for children will not be blocked

18IconOFF.message: Do not show adult content icons next to donuts

rtON.message: You are now proactively protected by WOT’s full coverage.

rtOFF.message: You are now running in manual mode - WOT’s proactive protection is disabled

whatIsSuspiciousDescription.message: Possible suspicious activity encompasses behaviors that are commonly attributed to scams, crypto-jacking, browser hijacking, and other types of harmful, risky, and hazardous websites.

whatIsNotSafeDescription.message: Untrusted activity encompasses behaviors that are commonly attributed to Scams, Phishing, Malware, PUPs, and other types of harmful, risky, and hazardous websites.

whatIsUnknownDescription.message: We don’t have enough information to rate this website at this time. We suggest you avoid giving your personal information, like your Social Security number, bank account, or credit card information.

optinAreYouSureMessage.message: To provide you with live 360-degrees web protection, some of WOT’s features require access to anonymous information collected from the websites you visit. This information will not be shared with third parties or used for marketing purposes. You can change your preferences at any time by visiting the settings page.

optinSubtitle.message: In order to protect you in real time, we need access to URLs you browse
